titles.title: A bill to designate the National Space Technology Laboratories in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi, as the "John C. Stennis Space Center".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to Subcommittee on Space Science and Applications.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Designates as the John C. Stennis Space Center the National Space Technology Laboratories of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration located in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi.
